location.physicalLocation: Albert Gore Research Center, Middle Tennessee State University

mods.abstract: A number of former Rutherford County teachers and students are included in this large oral history collection. Numerous interviewees recall Crichlow School: C. B. Arnette, Zane Cantrell, Shirley Jones, Martha Moffett, Richard Reeves, Mary Belle Robinson, and Jane Tucker. Additional highlights include interviews with educators Ruth Bowdoin, Vera Covington, Jerry Gaither, and Myrtle Lord. The collection also includes interviews with former students of Bradley Academy (Olivia Woods), Campus School (Harry Patillo), and Holloway High School (George Minter).
mods.accessCondition: Check with the MTSU Digital Collections team to assess copyright. Have the object identifier and title available with your request. http://cdm15838.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/

relatedItem.abstract: This collection provides access to a variety of sources that document the history of elementary and secondary schools in Rutherford County, Tennessee.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Albert Gore Research Center, Middle Tennessee State University
